availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel W. McGuire (Magoffin County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Frances May McGuire in Morgan County, Kentucky, on April 1, 1848. Father of Louisa M. McGuire, Sarah E. McGuire, William W. McGuire, Benjamin F. McGuire, James H. McGuire, Mary C. McGuire, and Susanna F. McGuire. Farmer in Morgan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Magoffin County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 91B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, p. 491.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Precinct 2, p. 355B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film 000839918, p. 89.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Morgan County Wills, 1866-1963, p. 55.
